Hello all,

Looking for high quality affordable VPS hosting? We can offer VPS servers from just EUR 20 / year (excl. VAT).

Uptime and stability is our priority, that's why we've built a fully redundant environment. Our storage system is based on CEPH with only the fastest Intel NVMe disks. This storage system is connected to our hypervisors with our fully redundant 80 GBps infiniband network, providing local-like storage performance.

We're hosting from datacenter Burcht near Antwerp.

We're making exclusive use of AMD CPUs only. We can offer you the following:

  • 1x AMD EPYC 7451 vCPU
  • 512 MB ECC Memory
  • 10 GB NVMe SSD Disk Space
  • /64 IPv6 Subnet (coming soon)
  • 1 x IPv4 address
  • 256 GB Bandwidth
  • 1 GBps shared uplink

Only € 20,- / year! (excl. VAT).
